extendedInfo.description: Four colors, hours of fun! The most brain twisting puzzle game on iPhone is launching on Google Play! Doodle between your lives run-out of candy games, pet games, jewel and bejeweled games, diamond games, Dragon games, bubble games, flow games, block / unblock games and so on.Color the shapes without letting the same colors sharing an edge. Sounds easy, right? It is! ...at first. Then comes the challenge part, and the even more challenge one when the clock is ticking! Doodle Fill is a highly addictive puzzle game that will delight and amaze you all day long. Donât get too ahead of yourself though. The later levels will take your brain to places it has never been to. You will never look at simple shapes and colors the same way! So what are you waiting for? Start doodling! -------------------------------Features: â Hours of FREE challenges!Easy to learn, but difficult to fully master.â Over 100 levels and growing! Each level is a unique experience of solving a puzzle.Some levels look familiar, but are way more difficult than the one you met before.â Genius tester!The more difficult the puzzle, the greater the sense of satisfaction when you complete it!âFamily Friendly!Great casual game for kids as well as adults!-------------------------------Find folks like you and discuss the solution: http://www.facebook.com/doodlefill .Do share your brain work with your mom, dad, sisters, brothers, cats and dogs!

reviews.title: Very relaxing game
reviews.comment: This game is very innovative. It has nice gfx and a mellow jazz soundtrack.
reviews.author: Daniel Gordon

reviews.title: Almost...
reviews.comment: I got really excited to see this app. I enjoy abstract coloring for fun and frequently set the rule that the same color can\'t touch itself. I figured this game would be like that without the initial drawing. Unfortunately, each area is completely filled in with a single touch of the desired color, greatly reducing the zen effect. I would like to see a Zen game play mode where you can color each area fully by hand. That would make the game perfect for me. As is, it just doesn\'t interest me....
reviews.author: Brooke L

reviews.title: Finished in an hour
reviews.comment: Love the game. Easy mind bending puzzles, great graphics, and more. But tons of ads plus once you get to level 60 you have to pay. Pay + tons of ads ruins this for me.
reviews.author: Pepper Ferguson

reviews.title: good game
reviews.comment: Me and my stepbrother had fun playing this game :)
reviews.author: Chelsea Westly

reviews.title: Love the game
reviews.comment: I love this game but hate it that you have to install other games/offers to keep unlocking new levels. If they could fix it so uou get more levels free I would rate it 5 stars!!

reviews.title: Cool...but there\'s a big but.
reviews.comment: I love the game, but when I exit out if it and come back to it, it freezes my phone and I have to restart my phone completely, so I lost all my user data.....fix please.

reviews.title: Needs a fix
reviews.comment: I just got to level 60 and now i have to buy coins to unlock the rest of the levels. I thought this game was hours of free play, i dislike games that make you pay to play. Please fix or update, only then will i give this the 5 stars the game itself deserves.
